resources.string: Enter this word in the terminal
The solution could not be found!
Enter one word from the terminal:
The length of the word you entered (%1$s) does not match the one expected (%2$s)\n\rThe word was not added!
You already have entered the word "%s".
Clearing all words means, that all words will be deleted.\nYou can\'t reverse the action. Once deleted you have to enter all words again!
You didn\'t enter more than 1 word.\nYou don\'t need to use this app.
The correct word to use has been found!
The word to unlock the terminal is \"%1$s\"\n

Something went wrong along the process of hacking the terminal.\nEither I wasn\'t provided with correct informations or one of my memory banks is malfunctioning.\nPlease contact somebody that knows what they do.
